api_list.name: Get Recipe Schema by Recipe ID
api_list.description: Get Recipe Schema by Recipe ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://recipe-scraper-api.p.rapidapi.com/recipes/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "recipe-scraper-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
